reviews.review_msg: So for all of you that have taken this course thinking that the textbook readings aren't needed, it's a sham. You need to read the textbook, as a good quarter of the exam has the material on it. Once you have thoroughly studied the textbook, notes, video, etc. the multiple choice are quite straightforward

Can't explain how easy.. MC tests were ridiculously easy. No need to attend class because everything is on the slides posted online. Just attend when watching movies. Would definitely take a class with him again, easy A

Berna is an amazing teacher!  His accent is not hard to understand, but rather funny.  He cares about the students and gives them a chance to redeem themselves if they do poorly on a midterm.  The class is based on the textbook and most of the information can be found in there.  I will warn you tough, it is not an easy course there is a lot of info
Test was confusing and questions were tricky
